[60+FPS v1.1 Rev2 (Hold Select button for 60FPS)]
D3000000 10000000
240112A4 00000000
DD000000 00000004
240112A4 00000001
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @lucky}

[60+FPS v1.1 Rev1 (Hold Select button for 60FPS)]
